mapper.sql: id, login_name, login_pass, full_name, sex, creater, create_time, updator, updatet_ime
mapper.select: SELECT id, login_name, full_name, sex FROM statement_sys_user_t WHERE login_name LIKE concat('%', #{0}, '%') OR full_name LIKE concat('%', #{0}, '%')
